chapters.description: Understand what data science is, its applications, and the data science lifecycle.
chapters.goal: Define data science and its key concepts.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a publicly available dataset (e.g., weather data) and visualize key trends.

chapters.description: Learn about different data types (numerical, categorical, textual) and common data structures (arrays, lists, dictionaries).
chapters.goal: Differentiate data types and understand basic data structures.
chapters.mini_project: Create a program to categorize data points based on their type.

chapters.description: Explore measures of central tendency (mean, median, mode), dispersion (range, variance, standard deviation), and data visualization techniques.
chapters.mini_project: Calculate and visualize descriptive statistics for a dataset of your choice.

chapters.description: Learn how to manipulate and clean data using JavaScript arrays, objects, and string manipulation techniques.
chapters.goal: Clean and transform data using JavaScript.
chapters.mini_project: Clean a messy dataset containing missing values and inconsistencies.

chapters.description: Explore popular data manipulation libraries in JavaScript (e.g., Dataframe.js, Lodash) and learn to perform advanced data transformations.
chapters.goal: Use libraries to efficiently manipulate data in JavaScript.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a dataset and generate new features using data manipulation libraries.

chapters.description: Learn to create interactive and informative visualizations using React libraries (e.g., Chart.js, Recharts).
chapters.mini_project: Build a dashboard to visualize key metrics from a dataset.

chapters.description: Understand different types of machine learning (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement) and common algorithms.
chapters.goal: Define machine learning types and key algorithms.
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple linear regression model to predict a variable.

chapters.description: Dive into common supervised learning algorithms like linear regression, logistic regression, and decision trees.
chapters.goal: Implement and evaluate supervised learning algorithms.
chapters.mini_project: Train a classification model to predict customer churn.

chapters.description: Explore unsupervised learning algorithms like k-means clustering and dimensionality reduction techniques (PCA).
chapters.goal: Apply unsupervised learning algorithms for data exploration and pattern recognition.
chapters.mini_project: Cluster customers based on their purchasing behavior using k-means.

chapters.chapter_title: Introduction to Python for Data Science
chapters.description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming and key data science libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.
chapters.goal: Perform basic data analysis and visualization using Python.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a dataset using Python and create a visualization of key findings.

chapters.description: Explore popular deep learning libraries like TensorFlow or PyTorch and understand their functionalities.
chapters.goal: Get familiar with deep learning frameworks.
chapters.mini_project: Build a simple neural network using a deep learning library.

chapters.description: Understand the basics of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP) and their relevance to data science.
chapters.goal: Explore cloud resources for data science projects.
chapters.mini_project: Deploy a simple data analysis script on a cloud platform.
